data.text:
@OMAKAROCKS @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Don’t marginalize or belittle others simply due to their sexuality being different from yours. I’m so sorry that their sexuality is a burden for you!

See how easy it is to completely over-analyze something by making wild assumptions about a stranger? Chill out lady! 🤦‍♂️
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone @MeagenGwen89 lawl
@rabbitgears @Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone First check your spelling second God is more then relevant unless you are an evil person in which anything goes...so go get done!!
@rabbitgears @Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone If it wasn't for the numerous young and stupid!!
@Maz16024672 @rabbitgears @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Who are you? Is that satan jr poking his dumbass head out to see himself over and over!! Yes it is!!

@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Sanskrit ( sensual create) word '"पाणि" ( paw~,pane~ Paane) has been anglicized here as "Pan". In general sense it is very sensual word according to sanskritic Trilogy "पाणि-गृहत्यरमदने" an a`in fin it ein gripping sensual ex-pleasing amataur-som'a.
@Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone I agree. Why do we need to know their preference? Who cares!
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone What is it that we need to see or hear?
@Amerinuck @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Gotta block you.  Inhabit hell with all the warmth you can handle.
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Nice curve, it’s non of the public’ Business
@Amerinuck @TwitterMoments @RollingStone It’s all good.  I have been damaged to no end by the southern baptist church.
@rabbitgears @KStaffeil @TwitterMoments @RollingStone God is irrelevant! Enough said 😂

@Redd_luv @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Is that the only word in your gays dictionary?   I believe that in a democracy BOTH sides of an issue should be heard and if you can dish it you should expect a response! Heterophobe
@rabbitgears @Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone You live in a fake world, God has everything to do with our reality...take your hate elsewhere I'm done!!

@KStaffeil @Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone lol how is God relevent to whether or not information is shoved onto you. You're a grown up, an autonomous individual, you have the choice of what you view and don't view on the internet, just ignore it, it's not like anyones forcing you to be here.
@rabbitgears @Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone God loving people don't see your logic as valid, it would be encouraging behavior unacceptable to God!!
@KStaffeil @Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Pretty sure someone coming out isn't being shoved in your face, if you think that is you must have a really hard time on the internet.
@rabbitgears @Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Yes they are youngster, ask the baker, candlestick maker, and your mama....she knows their trying to jam it bigtime!!
@rabbitgears @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Whatever boring....
@Jacqh419 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Ask God about that youngster!!
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone bang who you want....what's the big whoop
@Maz16024672 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone No ones ramming it down your throat.. the lady just came out, if you don't like what you see then move on.
@OMAKAROCKS @TwitterMoments @RollingStone It's not new, pansexuality revolves aroung the concept of being attracted to anyone regardless of their gender.
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone I also could careless what sexual orientation you are.
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Why does everyone need a label these days?

@Amerinuck @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Faith is something Christians possess.
 Sorry, folks like yourself probably blame God for not rescuing you from some dumb shit you wanted him to do. God loves you in spite of your seething hatred. He created you, he loves you. Suck on that chilli dog.

@creature4hire @keithsunderlan3 @sam2190 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone If you're bisexual, heterosexual, or [insert here], then please do listen to pansexual people. It doesn't do well if we sit with our eyes and ears close. And if you're asking honestly, then listen honestly. I think that's all most people ask.

@creature4hire @keithsunderlan3 @sam2190 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Kids these days? Are you referring to me? If so, how old do you think I am? As for kids these days, they might be our only saving grace when it comes to thinking and being inclusive. To help you learn better, here is a picture. https://t.co/8lPPyvFfNa
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone It means she'll play naked with ANYONE!

@__DragonWings__ @keithsunderlan3 @sam2190 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone If you do not know what DSM-V, APA, AMA are, then I encourage to do a bit of research and reading on the topic. However, I read in your bio that you are a conservative. So I'm not sure you'll do any research. Take care.

@Amerinuck @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Nice try Kevin, I am not  taking the bait because your hook has no worm. 
Go back down in your mom's basement and cry for her to bring you some supper. Those of us that  know God is real, we pray for the lost, like you. You should move out of mom's house, get a job and contribute

@Amerinuck @TwitterMoments @RollingStone I understand it as well as anyone, having grown up in the thick of it.  It is a mistake to assume that the only people who have experienced trauma/difficulties in life are those who have publicized the details of their personal lives.
@mikeburnam @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Classic homophobe, you don't give a damn about LGBT people
@gziggs @CunninghScott @TwitterMoments @RollingStone I'd rather be a dying whore than you....lol
@mikeburnam @TwitterMoments @RollingStone No your homophobic because this is basic information your stupid ass doesn't know about
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone AND before y’all start getting on my case...my saying Not Publicized does NOT equate to my saying that you have to hide it.
@bushmaster612 @bruceewayne__ @TwitterMoments @RollingStone How about just bring a homophobic bitch that u are!
@IndependentMine @TwitterMoments @RollingStone @JanelleMonae @BET @BETMusic @blackvoices Being pan isnt a sin!

@TwitterMoments @RollingStone I really don’t care what sexual orientation a person is. Homosexual, metrosexual, bisexual, heterosexual, pansexual... what you do in the bedroom ( or kitchen, or backseat or backyard) is your business and yours alone. Don’t know why it has to be publicized though. 🤷🏻‍♀️
@Captain_Mack_SC @Germanhammer6 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Homophobe!

@spayer @TwitterMoments @RollingStone It's not about attraction to sexualities, is about feeling attracted to all genders i.e. male, female, trans, nonbinary, agender, and other gender variant people.
@Rook_AshMainz @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Homophobe!

@mikeburnam @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Homophobe!
@TaraProudUSA @7GodLaRon @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Hate is worrisome. Homophobe!

@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Seriously enough!  I identify myself as a human being and that is enoug. I don't care what sexual orientation people are but why do they have to ram it down everyone's else's throat!
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Why is it all the highlighted mentions about this are pro-LGBTQ tweets? So I guess there’s no homo or pan phobes on twitter then right?
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Are there potsexuals or forksexuals or cupsexuals or how about toastersexuals.......#lbgtrfhijbvffdchjnhgccff gets stupider by the day.....
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone I don’t know who she is or what a pan sexual is. All I know is that I’ll keep her away from my dishes.
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone MOOLA parmar https://t.co/iFDuEEAiDa

@luis_r9945 @keithsunderlan3 @sam2190 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Referring to root words, regardless of the gender topic, bi means 2 and pan means all. And you can believe whatever you want but it's obvious the gp scope is definitely heading outside the gender binary. https://t.co/3nsdZb7zy5

@spayer @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Because people aren’t talking about it. You can see from all of the replies how people respond to the word alone, no matter if they know what it means or not. If you want to have a conversation about this or ask questions you can DM me. I’m willing to talk ☺️
@spayer @TwitterMoments @RollingStone You don’t need to look up anything if you don’t want to, if that’s what you’re asking. You can only educate yourself as much as you want to.
@geekwad71 @DoubleNW @TwitterMoments @RollingStone How does a press conference bother you if you don’t care

@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Is that not just the human condition 
If we're all really honest
It doesn't say have sex with both sexes
Just attraction
@topspacehat @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Thank you for elaborating on my comment
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone ...heard a young lady once who said this,  when I asked she said just what this lady said....not a new word just not heard often....

@joziuh @TwitterMoments @RollingStone That’s exactly what it means to be pansexual! I can love someone and accept them for who they are regardless of labels, which includes everyone. It doesn’t mean we’re attracted to everyone, it just means we *can* be. It’s more about personality.

@spayer @TwitterMoments @RollingStone It’s more about personality! I can be attracted to who a person is no matter what gender they identify with. A common misconception is that we are attracted to everyone. Of course we still have other standards just like everyone else. I hope this helps 💖
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone don't care who she "loves" or how many times; not standing in her way/no judgment; just don't see as heroic or ground breaking material.
@keithsunderlan3 @PikachenGoGo @sam2190 @TwitterMoments @RollingStone Nah dude, you forgot to include dragon-queer people. There are 72 genders now.
@TwitterMoments The P in pansexual simple stands for people. People come in all forms: male, female, transgender,  cross dressers, non conforming. She is attracted to the person not the gender.
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone “Pan” sexual is Spanish for fucking bread.

@TwitterMoments Is it the ugly step sister? Why was it left of out LGBT? Where is the petition to add the P and change it to being more inclusive LGBPTQ. Maybe that's why she didn't wanna come forward she felt abandoned by the community

@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Every time you turn around this sector of society has yet another specialized form of depravity.  Isn't pan and bi the same thing? Also who cares, it's not are life anyway!

@electrovert @TwitterMoments @RollingStone I'm not even talking about ruining someones livelihood. I guess i just remember a time when your sex life was no ones business but yours. Now everyone feels the need to tell you their preference. I don't care. Just go live your life.
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Does pansexual refer to folks who have sex with pans? Remember, God is watching.
@TwitterMoments @RollingStone Janelle... what's up, no clarity🤔🤔🤔
